title: Rotary pillow packing machine US-UMEO-250
title_ru: Ротационная машина для упаковки подушек US-UMEO-250
short_description: This US-UMEO-250 equipment is used for packaging products that are used regularly in life, including bread, ice cream, sweets, medicine, dough products, soap, and many other things. The speed of packaging is from 40 to 230 per minute, and the weight of the equipment is 500 kg. Dimensions: length 3770 mm, width 670 mm and height 1450 mm. Other models of this equipment are shown in the description, and their parameters and prices differ from each other.
short_description_uz: Ushbu US-UMEO-250 uskuna hayoda muntazam ishlatiladigan mahsulotlarni qadoqlash uchun xizmat qiladi, jumladan: non, muzqaymoq, shirinliklar, dori-darmon, xamirli mahsulotlar, sovun va shu kabi ko'plab narsalar misol bo'la oladi. Qadoqlash tezligi daqiqasiga 40 tadan 230 tagacha, uskuna vazni 500 kg. O'lchamlari: uzunligi 3770 mm, kengligi 670 mm va balandligi 1450 mm. Tavsifda ushbu uskunaning boshqa modellari ham aks etgan va ularning parametrlari hamda narxlari bir-biridan farqlanadi.
short_description_ru: Данное оборудование US-UMEO-250 используется для упаковки продукции, которая регулярно используется в мире, в том числе: хлеб, мороженое, сладости, лекарства, изделия из теста, мыло и многое другое. Скорость упаковки от 40 до 230 в минуту, вес оборудования 500 кг. Габариты: длина 3770 мм, ширина 670 мм и высота 1450 мм. Другие модели данного оборудования указаны в описании, их параметры и цены отличаются друг от друга.
short_description_en: This US-UMEO-250 equipment is used for packaging products that are used regularly in life, including bread, ice cream, sweets, medicine, dough products, soap, and many other things. The speed of packaging is from 40 to 230 per minute, and the weight of the equipment is 500 kg. Dimensions: length 3770 mm, width 670 mm and height 1450 mm. Other models of this equipment are shown in the description, and their parameters and prices differ from each other.
long_description:
This US-UMEO-250 equipment is used for packaging products that are used regularly in life, including bread, ice cream, sweets, medicine, dough products, soap, and many other things. The speed of packaging is from 40 to 230 per minute, and the weight of the equipment is 500 kg. Dimensions: length 3770 mm, width 670 mm and height 1450 mm. Other models of this equipment are shown in the description, and their parameters and prices differ from each other.

 

Basic parameters
Model US-UMEO-250 US-UMEO-320 US-UMEO-350
Bag length 65-190 mm / 120-280 mm 65-190 mm / 120-280 mm 90-220 mm / 150-330 mm
Bag width 30-110 mm................................................... 50-160 mm..................................................... 50-160 mm............................................
Product height (max) 55 mm 55 mm 60 mm
Film roll dia. (max) 320 mm
Film wdth (max) 250 mm 320 mm 350 mm
Packaging speed 40-230 pocket/min 40-230 pocket/min 40-180 pocket/min
Power 2.4 kW 2.6 kW 2.6 kW
Voltage 220V
Dimension 3770*670*1450 mm 3770*720*1450 mm 4020*770*1450 mm
Weight 500 kg 550 kg 600 kg
Packaging film Complex film (OPP / CPP, OPP / PE, PET / PE, aluminium foil, PE / PE etc.)
long_description_uz:
Ushbu US-UMEO-250 uskuna hayoda muntazam ishlatiladigan mahsulotlarni qadoqlash uchun xizmat qiladi, jumladan: non, muzqaymoq, shirinliklar, dori-darmon, xamirli mahsulotlar, sovun va shu kabi ko'plab narsalar misol bo'la oladi. Qadoqlash tezligi daqiqasiga 40 tadan 230 tagacha, uskuna vazni 500 kg. O'lchamlari: uzunligi 3770 mm, kengligi 670 mm va balandligi 1450 mm. Tavsifda ushbu uskunaning boshqa modellari ham aks etgan va ularning parametrlari hamda narxlari bir-biridan farqlanadi.

 

Umumiy parametrlar
Model US-UMEO-250 US-UMEO-320 US-UMEO-350
Qadoq uzunligi 65-190 mm / 120-280 mm 65-190 mm / 120-280 mm 90-220 mm / 150-330 mm
Qadoq kengligi 30-110 mm................................................... 50-160 mm..................................................... 50-160 mm............................................
Mahsulot balandligi (maks) 55 mm 55 mm 60 mm
Rulon diametri (maks) 320 mm
Plyonka kengligi (maks) 250 mm 320 mm 350 mm
Qadoqlash tezligi 40-230 qadoq/min 40-230 qadoq/min 40-180 qadoq/min
Quvvati 2.4 kW 2.6 kW 2.6 kW
Kuchlanishi 220V
O'lchami 3770*670*1450 mm 3770*720*1450 mm 4020*770*1450 mm
Vazni 500 kg 550 kg 600 kg
Mos material Kompleks plyonkalar (OPP / CPP, OPP / PE, PET / PE, alyumin folga, PE / PE va boshqalar)
long_description_ru:
Данное оборудование US-UMEO-250 используется для упаковки продукции, которая регулярно используется в мире, в том числе: хлеб, мороженое, сладости, лекарства, изделия из теста, мыло и многое другое. Скорость упаковки от 40 до 230 в минуту, вес оборудования 500 кг. Габариты: длина 3770 мм, ширина 670 мм и высота 1450 мм. Другие модели данного оборудования указаны в описании, их параметры и цены отличаются друг от друга.
